ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Treasure changes in Frontier Mountains
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know about loot, but I sure had a good time last night in the dreadlands outside Karanor s Castle. Myself and a few other folks from my guild who are
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know about loot, but I sure had a good time last night in the
dreadlands outside Karanor's Castle.

Myself and a few other folks from my guild who are plodding through hell #45
were amazed at the relative XP gain we saw there...it was my first time
really getting down and dirty in Kunark and it was a blast.

I may make it through 45 after all...

-Faras

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 08, 2000 2:16 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Treasure changes in Frontier Mountains


List seems awful quiet today.

Anyone notice any difference in the drops in Frontier since the patch? They
said they increased the loot, but I haven't noticed any changes. I don't
know that the loot really needed that much tweaking, certainly hadn't
noticed it being radically less than similarly dangerous areas. Any
thoughts?

Kitasi Faegehearper of E'ci
